SA20n1395:9: yatṣaṇṇāmapi vijñānakāyānāmanantaraniruddhaṃ kliṣṭaṃ ca mano yannityamavidyātmadṛṣṭyasmimānatṛṣṇālakṣaṇaiścaturbhiḥ kleśaiḥ samprayuktaṃ ||
SA20n1395:19: saṃskṛtaṃ cānidarśanamapratighaṃ ca rūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sarvabījāni ca ||
SA20n1395:22: manaskāraḥ sparśo vedanā saṃjñā cetanā chando'
SA20n1395:23: dhimokṣaḥ smṛtiḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śraddhā hrīrapatrāpyamalobho'
SA20n1395:25: moho vīrya prasrabdhirapramāda upekṣāhiṃsā rāgaḥ pratigho'
SA20n1395:26: vidyā māno dṛṣṭirvicikitsā krodha upanāhomrakṣaḥ pradāśa īrṣyāṃ mātsarya māyā śāṭhyaṃ mado vihiṃsāhrīkyamanapatrāpyaṃ styānamauddhatyamāśraddhyaṃ kausīdyaṃ pramādo muṣitasmṛtitādhikṣepo'
SA20n1395:27: samprajanyaṃ kaukṛtyamiddhaṃ vitarko vicāraścetyevaṃbhāgīyāḥ sahabhūsampreyuktāścaitasā dharmāḥ sahāya ityucyante ekālambanā anekākārāḥ sahabhuva ekaikavṛttayaḥ svabījaniyatāḥ samprayuktāḥ sākārāḥ sālambanāḥ sāśrayāḥ ||
SA20n1395:33: punaḥ pravartanānuvartanā śuddhāśuddhānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ karmaṇāṃ ca |
SA20n1395:35: api khalu sarveṇa sarvaṃ tadanyebhyo vijñānakāyebhyo vaiśeṣikaṃ karmāvalambanaṃ vikalpayatyālambanamupanidhyāti mādyatyunmādyati svapiti pratibudhyati mūrchāmāpadyate mūrchāyā vyuttiṣṭhati kāyavākkarma pravartayati vairāgyaṃ karoti vairāgyātparihīyate kuśalamūlāni samucchinatti kuśalamūlāni pratisandadhāti cyavata utpadyate ceti ||
SA20n1395:47: pratyupasthite viṣaye svarasena yo viṣayabalādeva vartate ||
SA20n1395:57: nyatamenānyatamena vā kleśopakleśena yaḥ samprayuktaḥ saṅkalpaḥ ||
SA20n1395:62: nyatamānyatamena vā punaḥ śraddhādikena kuśalena dharmeṇa yaḥ samprayukto vikalpa airyāpathikaḥ śailpasthāniko vā nirmāṇaṃ nirmiṇvato vikalpaḥ |
SA20n1395:73: nāpi sadbhūtamapavadate mithyādṛṣṭyā nāsti dattamityādyākārayā mithyādṛṣṭyā |
SA20n1395:74: dharmasthitijñāne vā punaryathābhūtaṃ vastu prekṣate parijānāti |
SA20n1395:86: prakṛtyāśrayadaurbalyatayā pariśramaklamadoṣatayā bhojanagauravatayāndhakāranimittamanasikāratayā sarvakarmāntaprativisrambhaṇatayā nidrābhyastatayā paropasaṃhāratayā ca |
SA20n1395:88: saṃvāhyamāno vā vidyayā vauṣadhairvā prabhāveṇā pasvāpyamānaḥ svapiti ||
SA20n1395:90: nidropavṛṃhitasya tatparyavasthānāsahanatayā karaṇīyasya tadābhogasvapanatayā paropasaṃhāratayā ca ||
SA20n1395:92: vātapittavibhramaṇatayā abhighātatayā ativirekatayā yaduta purīṣavirekeṇa vā śoṇitavirekeṇa vā viriktasya cātyadhyavasāyatayā ||
SA20n1395:101: prakṛtyā mṛdvindriyatayābhinavakuśalapakṣasya tadākāraliṅganimittamanasikāratayā parihāṇāya dharma samādāya vartanatayā kleśāvṛtatayā pāpamitraparigrahaṇatayā ca ||
SA20n1395:103: tīkṣṇendriyasyādhimātraṃ pāpāśayādhyācāradharmasamanvāgatatayā tadanulomamitralābhatayā tasya ca mithyādṛṣṭiparyavasthānasya ghanīkaraṇaparyantopagamanatayā sarvapāpādhyācāreṣvasaṃkocākaukṛtyapratilābhatayā ca ||
SA20n1395:109: prakṛtyā tīkṣṇendriyatayā mitra jñātisahāyakānāṃ puṇyakriyābhisaṃyogasandarśanatayā satpuruṣānupasaṅkamya saddharmaśravaṇatayā vicikitsotpattiniścayādhigamanatayā ca ||
SA20n1395:121: nava hetavo nava pratyayā akṣīṇāyuṣaḥ kālakriyāyā iti |
SA20n1395:123: amātrābhojī bhavati apathyabhojī apariṇatabhojī āmaṃ nāddharati pakkaṃ dhārayati bhaiṣajyaṃ na pratiṣevate sātmyāsātmyaṃ na jānīte akālacārī bhavati abrahmacārī bhavatīti |
SA20n1395:128: yenāsya tasminsamaye kuśalāḥ śraddhādayo dharmāścitte samudācaranti |
SA20n1395:130: sūkṣme punaḥ saṃjñāpracāre kuśalaṃ cittaṃ vyāvartate |
SA20n1395:133: sa tasminsamaye pūrvābhyastaṃ ca kuśalamābhogaṃ kartumasamartho bhavati parairapi smārayitumaśakyaḥ ||
SA20n1395:137: tasya tasminsamaye lobhādisahagatā akuśaladharmāścitte samudācaranti yāvadaudārikī saṃjñā .....iti pūrvavatsarvaṃ kuśalavat |
SA20n1395:139: tasya pragāḍhā duḥkhā vedanāḥ kāye nāvakrāmanti māraṇāntikāḥ |
SA20n1395:146: kuśalākuśalakārī vā tadakārī vā svayamasamanusmaranparairvāsmāryamāṇo naiva kuśalacitto na kliṣṭacitto mriyamāṇaḥ |
SA20n1395:147: sa naiva sukhamaraṇena mriyate naiva duḥkhamaraṇena |
SA20n1395:148: sa ca punaḥ kuśalākuśalakārī pudgalo mriyamāṇaḥ svayaṃ vā pūrvābhyastānkuśalākuśalāndharmānsmarati parairvā smāryate |
SA20n1395:149: tasya tasminsamaye yadabhyāsabāhulyādbalavattaraṃ bhavati tena cittaṃ namate'
SA20n1395:151: sacetpunarubhayaṃ samamabhyastaṃ bhavati tatra yadeva tatprathamataḥ samanusmarati samanasmāryate vā na punarvyāvartate nānyataścitta parāvartate |
SA20n1395:152: sa tasminsamaye hetudvayamadhipatīkṛtvā yaduta prapañcābhiratihetuṃ ca śubhāśubhakarmahetuṃ ca kālaṃ kurvannupayukte tasminpūrvakarmākṣipte phale'
SA20n1395:156: yadasya pūrvakaṃ pāpakamakuśalaṃ karma kṛtaṃ bhavatyupacitaṃ tattasya tasminsamaye sāyāhnakāla iva parvatānāṃ vā parvatakūṭānāṃ vā chāyevāvalambate'
SA20n1395:160: etadviparyayeṇa punaḥ pūrvakakuśala karmaphale varttamāna iha kuśalakārī tamojyotiṣparāyaṇo veditavyaḥ |
SA20n1395:163: sya svapna ivāvikṛtaṃ manāpavicitraṃ rūpadarśanaṃ prādurbhavati ||
SA20n1395:168: ākāśaparāmarśanamakṣi parivartanaṃ mukhataḥ phenaniḥsravaṇa mityevaṃbhāgīyā dharmā utpadyante ||
SA20n1395:169: sa cetpunarmadhyakārī bhavati tasya kecidvikārā bhavanti kecinna bhavanti |
SA20n1395:171: sarvasya ca mriyamāṇasya vispaṣṭasaṃjñāvasthāmaprāptasya dīrghakālābhyasta ātmasnehaḥ samudācarati |
SA20n1395:175: tatra srotaāpannasya sakṛdāgāminaśca tasminsamaya ātmasnehaḥ samudācarati |
SA20n1395:176: sa ca srotaāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmī vā tamātmasnehaṃ nitīrya nitīryābhinigṛhṇāti nādhivāsayati |
SA20n1395:177: tadyathā balavattarapuruṣo durbalatareṇa puruṣeṇa yudhyamāno durbalamabhinigṛhṇāti tadvadatrāpi nayo draṣṭavyaḥ ||
SA20n1395:178: anāgamināṃ tu sa ātmasnehastadā naiva samudācarati ||
SA20n1395:179: tatra marmacchedo narakagatiṃ devagatiṃ ca sthāpayitvā tadanyeṣu sarvajanmāyataneṣu bhavati |
SA20n1395:196: anantara samutpannatvācca tasyātmabhāvasnehasya pūrvaprapañcābhiratihetuparibhāvitatvācca śubhāśubhakarmaparibhāvitatvācca tasyāśrayasya taddhetudvayamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā svabījādantarābhavasya taddeśanirantarasya prādurbhāvo bhavati |
SA20n1395:201: sukṛtakāriṇāṃ punastadyathāvadātasya vastrasya nirbhāsaḥ sajyotsnāyā vā rātryāḥ |
SA20n1395:202: sa ca viśuddhasya divyasya cakṣuṣo gocarībhavati |
SA20n1395:203: tasminsamaye sa pūrvaka ātmabhāvābhilāṣo na punaḥ samudācarati vijñānasya pratiṣiddhatvāt |
SA20n1395:206: tasya ca divyacakṣuriva cakṣurna vyāhanyate yāvadupapattyāyatanāt |
SA20n1395:207: gatirapi na vihanyate yathā ṛddhimato yāvadupapattyāyatanādeva |
SA20n1395:208: sa tena cakṣuṣātmasabhāgānāntarābhavikān sattvānpaśyati teṣāṃ copapattisthānamātmanaśca |
SA20n1395:215: alābhe punaścutvā punaḥ saptāhaṃ tiṣṭhati yāvatsapta saptāhāni tiṣṭhatyupapattipratyayamalabhamānaḥ |
SA20n1395:220: tasya punaḥ paryāyā antarābhava ityapyucyate maraṇabhavotpattibhavayorantarāle prādurbhāvāt |
SA20n1395:226: sacetpunastenākuśalakarmakāriṇaurabhrikabhūtena vā kokkuṭikabhūtena vā saukarikabhūtena vā ityanyatamānyatamasminnasaṃvarikanikāye vyavasthitena narakasaṃvartanīyaṃ pāpakamakuśalaṃ karma kṛtaṃ bhavatyupacitaṃ sa tathābhūtāneva sattvāṃstathā karmāṇyupapattyāyatane paśyati tāṃścorabhrādīnsvapnavat |
SA20n1395:230: tasmāccyavamānasya yathāpūrva maraṇabhave vyākulaṃ rūpadadarśanaṃ tathaiva bhavati |
SA20n1395:234: ebhirahaṃ sārdhaṃ krīḍiṣyāmi ramiṣyāmi paricārayiṣyāmi śilpaṃ śikṣiṣyāmīti |
SA20n1395:235: sa tatra viparyāsādvividhaiḥ karma kāraṇaiḥ kāryate |
SA20n1395:237: anyathā punastādṛśaṃ darśanaṃ vinā tasya tatra gamanābhilāṣa eva na syāt |
SA20n1395:240: yathā naraka evaṃ narakasadṛśeṣu preteṣūtpādo draṣṭavyaḥ |
SA20n1395:241: galagaṇḍādiṣvanyeṣu punastiryakpreteṣu manuṣyeṣu kāmāvacareṣu rūpāvacareṣu ca devanikāyeṣūpapadyamāna ātmasabhāgānabhipramodamānānsattvānpaśyatyupapattyāyatane |
SA20n1395:245: tatra trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ sammukhībhāvānmātuḥ kukṣau garbhasyāvakrāntirbhavati |
SA20n1395:250: ntarāyo na bhavati yonidoṣakṛto bījadoṣakṛtaḥ karmadoṣakṛtaśca |
SA20n1395:252: sacedyonirvātopastabdhā bhavati pittopastabdhā vā tilamadhyā vā śakaṭamukhī vā śaṅkhamukhī vā saliṅgā savaṅkā sadoṣā sakaṣāyetyevaṃ bhāgīyā yonidoṣā veditavyāḥ ||
SA20n1395:257: māturvā pūtiko bhavati piturvā tadubhayorvetyevaṃ bhāgīyā bījadoṣā veditavyāḥ ||
SA20n1395:259: sacenmātrā vā pitrā vā putrasaṃvartanīyaṃ karma na kṛtaṃ bhavatyupacitamubhābhyāṃ vā |
SA20n1395:260: punastena vā sattvena mātāpitṛsaṃvartanīyaṃ karma na kṛtaṃ bhavatyupacitaṃ |
SA20n1395:261: tābhyāṃ vā mātāpitṛbhyāmanyādṛśaputrasaṃvartanīyaṃ karma kṛtaṃ bhavatyupacitaṃ |
SA20n1395:262: tena vā sattvenānyādṛśamātāpitṛsaṃvartanīyaṃ karma kṛtaṃ bhavatyupacitaṃ |
SA20n1395:266: tasya mātāpitṛsambhūte śukraśoṇite viparyasta darśanaṃ tadā pravartate |
SA20n1395:268: mātaraṃ ca pitaraṃ ca paśyatyanyonyaṃ vipratipadyamānaṃ |
SA20n1395:271: tāṃ ca vipratipattiṃ dṛṣṭvā tasya tatra saṃrāga utpadyate |
SA20n1395:272: sacetstrī bhavitukāmo bhavati puruṣe saṃrāgaḥ sa vāsecchotpadyate |
SA20n1395:273: sacetpuruṣo bhavitukāmo bhavati tasya striyāṃ saṃrāgaḥ saṃvāsecchotpadyate |
SA20n1395:276: tadutpādācca puruṣameva vā kevalaṃ paśyati striyaṃ vā |
SA20n1395:277: sa ca yathā yathā taṃ deśamupaśliṣyate tathā tathāsya tadanyeṣāmaṅgānāṃ darśanamavahīyate |
SA20n1395:278: yonidarśanaṃ vā puruṣendriyadarśanaṃ vā kevalaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati |
SA20n1395:283: kuleṣu pratyājāyate tasya cyutikāle praveśakāle ca kolāhalaśabdo naḍavanagahanādipraveśaśca nimittaṃ prādurbhavati ||
SA20n1395:285: tasya praśāntamadhuraśabdaprādurbhāvaḥ prāsāda vimānādisthānārohaṇaṃ ca nimittaṃ prādurbhavati |
SA20n1395:289: dvayorapi ca tau śukraśoṇitabindū mātureva yonau miśrībhūtau śaraṃ baddhā tiṣṭhata ekapiṇḍībhūtau tadyathā pakkaṃ payaḥ śītabhāvamāpadyamānaṃ |
SA20n1395:294: tannirodhasamakālaṃ ca tasyaiva sarvabījakasya sāmarthyāttadanyasūkṣmendriya mahābhūtavyatimiśro'
SA20n1395:297: sācāsau kalalāvasthā tāni ca tasya kalasyendriyamahābhūtāni kāyendriyeṇaiva sahotpadyante |
SA20n1395:298: indriyādhiṣṭhānamahābhūtāni ca tairevendriyamahābhūtaiḥ kāyendriyeṇa ca sahotpadyante |
SA20n1395:300: indriyāṇāṃ tadadhiṣṭhānānāṃ ca prādurbhāvātkṛtsna āśrayo niṣpanno bhavati pratilabdhaḥ |
SA20n1395:301: tatpunaḥ kalalarūpaṃ taiścitta caitasikairdharmairanyonyayoga kṣematayā sammūrcchitamityucyate |
SA20n1395:305: yatra ca kalaladeśe tadvijñānaṃ sammūrcchitaṃ so'
SA20n1395:307: evaṃ hi tadvijñānaṃ yasmādeva deśāccyavate tasminneva deśe tatprathamataḥ sammūrchati |
SA20n1395:308: tatpunaḥ sarvabījakaṃ vijñānaṃ parinirvāṇadharmakāṇāṃ paripūrṇabījamaparinirvāṇadharmakāṇāṃ punastrividhabodhibījavikalaṃ ||
SA20n1395:317: tatra pṛthivīdhātumupādāya rūpaṃ vardhate vistīrṇataratāṃ gacchati |
SA20n1395:323: kulabalarūpāyurbhogādikasya tu phalasya prādhānyena śubhāśubhaṃ karma kāraṇaṃ ||
SA20n1395:324: tatra cātmabhāve bālānāmahamiti vā mameti vāsmīti vā bhavati |
SA20n1395:328: tadanyattu sarvaṃ veditaṃ vipākajaṃ vā viṣayapratyayaṃ vā |
SA20n1395:335: prādurbhūte ca phala upayuktaphalaṃ bhavati tadbījaṃ |
SA20n1395:336: evaṃ hi saṃsāraprabandhaḥ pravartate yāvanna parinirvāti |
SA20n1395:337: yāni punastatrādattaphalāni bījāni tāni kānicidupapadya vedanīyāni bhavanti |
SA20n1395:343: yasya ca bījasya tasminnātmabhāve phalaṃ pratisaṃvedyamapi pratyayavaikalyānna pratisaṃvedyate'
SA20n1395:345: ataḥ sarvātmabhāvabījakatvātpratyekaṃ sarvātmabhāvānāmekatra rajyamānaḥ sarvatra rakto vaktavyaḥ |
SA20n1395:347: teṣu punarātmabhāveṣu yāni bījāni kleśapakṣyāṇi tatra dauṣṭhulyānuśaya saṃjñā |
SA20n1395:348: yāni ca punarvipākapakṣyāṇi tadanyāvyākṛtapakṣyāṇi ca teṣu dauṣṭhulyasaṃjñaiva nānuśayasaṃjñā |
SA20n1395:349: yāni punaḥ śraddhādikuśaladharmapakṣyāṇi bījāni teṣu naivānuśayasaṃjñā dauṣṭhulyasaṃjñā |
SA20n1395:352: ataśca sakalamāśrayaṃ dauṣṭhulyopagatatvāddauṣṭhulyasvabhāvāttathāgatā duḥkhataḥ prajñāpayanti yaduta saṃskāraduḥkhatayā ||
SA20n1395:353: bījaparyāyāḥ punardhāturgotraṃ prakṛtirhetuḥ satkāyaḥ prapañca ālaya upādānaṃ duḥkhaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭyadhiṣṭhānamasmimānādhiṣṭhānaṃ cetyevambhāgīyāḥ paryāyā veditavyāḥ ||
SA20n1395:354: parinirvāṇakāle punarviśuddhānāṃ yogināṃ parivṛttāśrayāṇāṃ sarvakliṣṭadharmanirbīja āśrayaḥ parivartate |
SA20n1395:362: sa punaḥ sampūrṇo bhavati navabhirmāsaiḥ pareṇa vā punariti |
SA20n1395:364: ṣaḍbhiḥ saptabhirvā māsairasampūrṇa eva vikalo vā |
SA20n1395:365: tasyāṃ punaḥ ṣaḍāyatanāvasthāyāṃ māturabhyantarajātaudariko rasoyenāsya puṣṭirbhavati |
SA20n1395:366: kalalādyāsu punaḥ sūkṣmatarāsvavasthāsu sūkṣmeṇa rasena puṣṭirveditavyā ||
SA20n1395:370: kalalāvasthā arbudāvasthā peśyavasthā ghanāvasthā praśākhāvasthā keśaromanakhāvasthā indriyāvasthā vyañjanāvasthā ca |
SA20n1395:379: tataḥ pūrvakarmavaśānmātrā ca viṣamāparihaṇā dviṣamāparihārajaiśca garbhe tadanukūlairvāyubhiḥ keśavaikṛtyaṃ varṇavaikṛtyaṃ tvagvaikṛtyamaṅgavaikṛtyaṃ ca jāyate ||
SA20n1395:381: pūrvaṃ tāvadanena tatsaṃvarṇanīyaṃ pāpakamakuśalaṃ karma kṛtaṃ bhavati |
SA20n1395:382: mātā vāsya kṣāralavaṇarasaprāyamannapānaṃ bāhulyena niṣevate yena mandakeśaromatāgarbhasya bhavati ||
SA20n1395:394: yenāsya dadrulatā vā kacchulatā vā kuṣṭhalatā vā tvagdoṣā jāyante ||
SA20n1395:397: vartamānaḥ pratyayo mātā dhāvanaplavanalaṅghanādīnīryāpathānadhyāpadyate yenāsya viṣamāparihārādaṅgavaikṛtyaṃ jāyate indriyavaikalyaṃ vā bhavet ||
SA20n1395:398: [sacet]punastrī bhavati sa pṛṣṭhavaṃśaṃ niśrityoraḥ saṃpuraskṛtya vāme pārśve māturavatiṣṭhate |
SA20n1395:399: sacetpumān bhavati sa uro niśritya pṛṣṭhavaṃśaṃ saṃpuraskṛtya dakṣiṇe pārśve māturavatiṣṭhate ||
SA20n1395:400: sampūrṇe ca punastasmingarbhe māturadhimātraṃ garbhamasahamānāyā adhyātmabhavā vātāḥ prādurbhavanti ye'
SA20n1395:402: tasya ca karmavipākajā upapattyaṃśikā vāyavo jāyante |
SA20n1395:404: tataḥ sa garbhaḥ kośapariveṣṭita eva niṣkrāmati |
SA20n1395:405: niṣkrāmataḥ punaḥ sa kośaḥ kukṣau bhavati |
SA20n1395:407: sa jātaḥ krameṇaupapatyaṃśikaṃ ca sparśaṃ spṛśati |
SA20n1395:412: karmāṇi ca karoti yaduta laukikāni śilpakarmasthānāni |
SA20n1395:414: sa duḥkhaṃ ca pratisaṃvedayate yaduta pūrvakarmapratyayaṃ vā vartamānapratyayaṃ vā |
SA20n1395:415: yathā pratyayahāryaśca bhavati yaduta pañcagatigamanapratyayairvā nirvāṇagamanapratyayairvā ||
SA20n1395:416: yeṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ yasminsattvanikāya ātmabhāvasya prādurbhāvo bhavati tatra yā sattvasabhāgatā sā teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ caturbhiḥ pratyayaiḥ pratyayakāryaṃ karoti |
SA20n1395:420: tato jātaṃ viditvā tadupamenāhāreṇa stanyena cāpāyayanti poṣayanti saṃvardhayanti |
SA20n1395:425: no tu sukhaduḥkhavyatikramamavāpnuvanti yāvanna buddhānāṃ bodhimāgamya parato ghoṣānvayādadhyātmaṃ ca yoniśo manasi kārādāsravakṣayamanuprāpnuvanti |
SA20n1395:433: sacetsaṃvartasaṃvartanīyaṃ karma pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati tato bāhyena saṃvartapratyayena teṣāṃ saṃvarto bhavati |
SA20n1395:437: bāhyabhāvā rūpiṇa audārikāścāturmahābhūtikā sthāvarasantatayaśca na tu tathādhyātmikāḥ |
SA20n1395:438: teṣāṃ ca bhājanānāṃ yadvivartasaṃvartanīyaṃ karma tanniyataṃ kalpākṣepakaṃ |
SA20n1395:443: tasmāt teṣāṃ pareṇāpi kalpādbhavati tataścārvānyāvaddaśa saṃvatsarāditi ||
SA20n1395:448: caturthe punardhyāne teṣāṃ caturthadhyānabhūmikānāṃ devānāṃ sahaiva vimānairutpattiḥ |
SA20n1395:453: dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ caturtha dhyānaṃ ||
SA20n1395:464: brahmakāyikānāṃ viṃśatirantarakalpāḥ kalpa iti kṛtvāyuṣo vyavasthānaṃ |
SA20n1395:465: brahmapurohitānāṃ catvāriṃśadantarakalpāḥ kalpa iti kṛtvā yuṣo vyavasthānaṃ |
SA20n1395:466: mahābrahmaṇāṃ ṣaṣṭirantarakalpāḥ kalpa iti kṛtvāyuṣo vyavasthānaṃ ||
SA20n1395:468: sa samayo yadāparimitāyuṣaḥ sattvā āyuṣā hīyamānā yāvadaśītivarṣasahasrāyuṣo bhavanti |
SA20n1395:469: te punarakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ samādānahetorhīyamānā yāvaddaśavarṣāyuṣo bhavanti |
SA20n1395:470: te punaḥ saṃvegaprāptānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ samādānahetorāyuṣā vardhamānāḥ punaryāvadaśītivarṣasahasrāyuṣo bhavantīti yaścāyamapakarṣo yaścāyamutkarṣastaddvayam abhisamasyāntarakalpa ityucyate |
SA20n1395:472: tasya punarantarakalpasya tribhirniyāṇaṃ bhavati durbhikṣeṇa rogeṇa śastreṇa ca |
SA20n1395:474: evaṃrūpaṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ prajñāyate yajjīrṇāsthyapi kvāthayitvā yātrāṃ kalpayati |
SA20n1395:475: yacca tatra kadācit kathañcidyavakalaṃ vā taṇḍulakalaṃ vā kola kulatthatilakalaṃ vādhigacchati taṃ maṇiratnamiva samudge prakṣipya vikarṣati |
SA20n1395:476: te ca sattvā yadbhūyasā nisthāmāḥ pṛthivyāmuttānakā nipatitā utthātumapi na śaknuvanti |
SA20n1395:477: evaṃrūpeṇa durbhikṣeṇa yadbhūyasā sattvāḥ kālaṃ kurvanti ||
SA20n1395:480: te ca sattvāḥ saṅgamya samāgamya mṛdukaṃ saṃvegaṃ labhante |
SA20n1395:481: teṣāṃ tena hetunā tena pratyayenāyuṣaścāhānirbhavati durbhikṣasya ca vyāvṛttiḥ ||
SA20n1395:483: tasyaiva saṃvegasya punarvigamāddhīyamānāstadā bahava ītaya upadravā upāyāsā bhavanti |
SA20n1395:485: sa punasteṣāṃ rogaḥ paraṃ saptamāsānsapta cāhorātrāṇi bhavati |
SA20n1395:488: tena hetunā tena pratyayena punarāyuṣā na hīyante |
SA20n1395:491: tasyaiva saṃvegasya vigamādāyuṣā hīyamānāstadā teṣāmanyonyaṃ sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā tīvraṃ vadhakacittaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati |
SA20n1395:492: tataste yadeva tṛṇaṃ vā śarkarāṃ vā kaṭhallaṃ vā gṛhṇanti tāni bhavanti tīkṣṇāni śastrāṇi suniśitāni |
SA20n1395:496: teṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ tadā paramāstisro vipattayo bhavanti |
SA20n1395:514: cattvāriṃśadapakarṣoktarṣā yadā niryātā bhavanti tadā sarvapaścima utkarṣe narakebhyaḥ sattvāścyavante nopapadyante |
SA20n1395:515: sakalacyutau ca teṣāṃ saṃvṛtto loko vaktavyo yaduta narakasaṃvartanyā |
SA20n1395:517: manuṣyeṣu punaranyatamaḥ sattvo dharmatāpratilambhiko yāvaddvitīyaṃ dhyānamupasampadya viharati |
SA20n1395:519: pi sattvā dharmatāpratilambhikā yāvadvitīyaṃ dhyānamupasampadya viharanti |
SA20n1395:521: tadā cāyaṃ lokaḥ saṃvṛtto vaktavyo yaduta manuṣyasaṃvartanyā |
SA20n1395:524: pi sattvo na prajñāyate tadopakaraṇa sambhavo'
SA20n1395:527: pi na prajñāyate tadā vṛṣṭirapi na prajñāyate |
SA20n1395:531: ṣaṭprakāradāhyavastvadhikārataścāpareṣā sūryamaṇḍalānāṃ prādurbhāvo bhavati yaduta sattvānāmeva saṃvartanīkarmādhipatyataḥ |
SA20n1395:533: te punaḥ sapta bhūtvā sapta guṇaṃ tāpayanti |
SA20n1395:536: kunadyo mahānadyo yāsāṃ tṛtīyena sūryamaṇḍalena śoṣaḥ |
SA20n1395:537: anavataptaṃ mahāsaro yasya caturthena sūryamaṇḍalena śoṣaḥ |
SA20n1395:541: sumerurmahāpṛthivī ca yayoḥ ṣaṣṭhenaiva saptamena ca sūryamaṇḍalena sārataravigrahatayā dāhaḥ |
SA20n1395:542: tata eva cārcirvāyunā preritā yāvadbrahmalokaṃ dahantī paraiti ||
SA20n1395:544: apsambhavaṃ vastu tṛṇādayo yeṣāṃ prathamenaiva śoṣaḥ |
SA20n1395:546: sthāvaraṃ sāravigrahaṃ vastu yasya dvābhyāṃ dāhaḥ ||
SA20n1395:547: tasya khalu lokasanniveśasyaivaṃ dagdhasya dhmātasya yathāsūtrameva vistareṇa masirapi na prajñāyate chārikāpi na prajñāyate |
SA20n1395:548: iyatā lokaḥ saṃvṛtto bhavati yaduta bhājanasaṃvartanyā |
SA20n1395:552: yataśca sapta tejaḥsaṃvartanyaḥ samatikrāntā bhavanti tato dvitīye dhyāne sahajo'
SA20n1395:558: tivṛttā bhavanti tataḥ punarekā tejaḥsaṃvartanī bhavati |
SA20n1395:559: tadanantaraṃ tṛtīye dhyāne sahajo vāyudhātuḥ sambhavati |
SA20n1395:569: tatra tatprathamata ākāśe tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ vivartate |
SA20n1395:573: tatra tṛtīyātsaṃvartaśīrṣātsattvā āyuḥkṣayātpuṇyakṣayāccyutvā tṛtīye dhyāna upapadyante |
SA20n1395:577: prathamātpunaḥ saṃvartanīśīrṣādanyatamaḥ sattva āyuḥkṣayādyāvatpuṇyakṣayāccyutvā prathamadhyāna upapadyate |
SA20n1395:584: pi sattvā āyuḥkṣayādyāvatpuṇyakṣayād dvitīyād dhyānāccyuttvā prathama eva dhyāna upapadyante |
SA20n1395:590: tataḥ paścādiha trisāhasramahāsāhasra lokadhātu pramāṇaṃ vāyumaṇḍalamabhinirvartate trisāhasramahāsāhasrasya lokasya pratiṣṭhābhūtamavaimānikānāṃ sattvānāṃ ca |
SA20n1395:599: tasyāṃ vivṛttāyāṃ punastasyopari tatkarmādhipatyādeva nānādhātugarbho meghaḥ sambhavati |
SA20n1395:604: graḥ śreṣṭhaḥ praṇīto dhātustato vāyusaṃhāra vaśena sumeruḥ sañjāyate catūratnamayaḥ suvarṇamayo rūpyamayaḥ sphaṭikamayo vaidūryamayaḥ ||
SA20n1395:605: yaḥ punastatra madhyo dhātustasmātsapta kāñcanaparvatā abhinirvartante |
SA20n1395:613: tata uttarottarārdhapramāṇatayā tadanyeṣāṃ kāñcanaparvatānāṃ vinatakādīnāṃ nimindharaparyavasānānāṃ pramāṇaṃ veditavyaṃ |
SA20n1395:614: teṣāmeva ca parvatānāṃ yāni kūṭāni tatprakāraprabhedasādharmyeṇa teṣāmapi tāni nāmāni draṣṭavyāni ||
SA20n1395:615: hīnātpunardhātoścaturṣu sumerupārśveṣu bahiḥ kāñcanaparvatānāṃ catvāro dvīpā antardvīpāścāṣṭau cakravāḍaśca parvato nimindharasya parvatasyārdhapramāṇena |
SA20n1395:635: teṣāṃ punaḥ saptānāṃ kāñcanaparvatānāmantarāle yadudakaṃ tadaṣṭāṅgopetaṃ |
SA20n1395:640: śvataro mucilindo manasvī dhṛtarāṣṭro mahākāla elapatraśca ||
SA20n1395:650: prathamāyāṃ karoṭapāṇayo dvitīyāyāṃ rudhirapāṇayastṛtīyāyāṃ sadāmadāścaturthyāṃ mālādharāḥ |
SA20n1395:651: uparimerutale caturṣu koṇeṣu catvāraḥ kūṭāḥ pañcayojanaśatocchrāyāḥ |
SA20n1395:653: yugandharasya ca caturṣu pārśveṣu mahārājānāṃ rājadhānyaḥ |
SA20n1395:656: himavataḥ parvatarājñaḥ sāmantakena surapārśvo nāma kāñcanamayaḥ prāgbhāraḥ pañcāśadyojanāyāmastāvadvistāra eva |
SA20n1395:659: tatra ca supratiṣṭhito nāma vṛkṣarājaḥ saptatālapaṃktiparivāraḥ |
SA20n1395:660: mandākinī ca puṣkariṇī śataparivārā tasyaiva supratiṣṭhitasya krīḍābhūmiḥ |
SA20n1395:661: yatrāsau kāmarūpī bhūtvā tasyāḥ puṣkariṇyā basamṛṇālānyāvṛhya paribhuṃkte |
SA20n1395:663: tasyaiva sāmantakenānavataptaṃ mahāsaraḥ pañcāśadyojanagambhīraṃ pañcāśadyojanavistāraṃ suvarṇavālukāstṛtamaṣṭāṅgopetapānīyasampannamabhirūpaṃ darśanīyaṃ prāsādikaṃ |
SA20n1395:666: tasmiṃśca sumerutale devapurī sanniviṣṭā daśayojanasahasraparimāṇā dairdhyeṇa vaipulyena ca |
SA20n1395:677: anavataptasya saraso dakṣiṇabhāgena mahājambūryasya nāmnāyaṃ jambūdvīpaḥ |
SA20n1395:687: te ca bhavanti rūpiṇo manomayā ityanusūtrameva sarva |
SA20n1395:697: yaśca prabhūtataraṃ bhuṅkte sa durvarṇataro bhavati gurukakāyataraḥ |
SA20n1395:703: tataḥ strīpuruṣasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇaikatyānāṃ strīndriyaṃ prādurbhavati ekatyānāṃ puruṣendriyaṃ |
SA20n1395:711: evaṃ tasya ca kṣatriyamaṇḍalasya yathāsūtraṃ brāhmaṇavaiśyaśūdramaṇḍalānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati |
SA20n1395:713: tataḥ sūryācandramasornakṣatrāṇāṃ ca loke prādurbhāvo bhavati ||
SA20n1395:718: tayoḥ punaścandramaṇḍalaṃ śīghrataragati ca veditavyamaniyatagati ca |
SA20n1395:723: te punaryadā śliṣṭāḥ sumerorvahanti tadā nidāghaḥ prajñāyate |
SA20n1395:724: yadā viśliṣṭā bhavanti tadā hemantaḥ prajñāyate |
SA20n1395:729: yathā yathā vaṅkībhavati tathā tathā suṣṭhutaraṃ sampūrṇaḥ saṃdṛśyate |
SA20n1395:730: kṛṣṇapakṣe punaryathāyathāvamūrdhībhavati tathā tathā hrāsaḥ saṃdṛśyate |
SA20n1395:731: mahāsamudre matsakacchapādīnāṃ prativimbakotpādānmadhye candramasaḥ śyāmatā prajñāyate |
SA20n1395:732: nakṣatrāṇāṃ punaḥ parimāṇaṃ paramaṣṭādaśa krośā madhyānāṃ daśa krośāḥ sūkṣmāṇāṃ catvāraḥ ||
SA20n1395:734: tato'nyatamaḥ sattvaḥ saṃkliṣṭenādhipatyasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇā yamo rājotpadyate |
SA20n1395:735: tasyānantaraṃ narakapālā nirmitopamā utpadyante yātanākāraṇānirvartakā lohādayo nārakaścāgniḥ prādurbhavati |
SA20n1395:736: tataste yathākarmopagāḥ sattvāstatrotpadyante tadanyāsu ca gatiṣu ||
SA20n1395:737: evaṃ kṛtvā koṭiśataṃ cāturdvīpikānāṃ koṭiśataṃ sumerūṇāṃ koṭiśataṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devanikāyānāṃ koṭiśataṃ brahmalokānāṃ trisāhasreṣu yugapadvivartate saṃvartate ca |
SA20n1395:739: sāhasrikaścūḍikastadyathā sahasraṃ candrāṇāṃ sahasraṃ sūryāṇāṃ sahasraṃ yāvadbrahmalokānāmaikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya |
SA20n1395:740: yatkhalu cūḍikānāṃ sahasraṃ sa dvisāhasro madhyaḥ |
SA20n1395:741: yatkhalu madhyānāṃ sahasraṃ sa trisāhasro mahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ ||
SA20n1395:743: nāstyanto nāsti paryanto lokadhātūnāṃ saṃvartamānānāṃ vivartamānānāṃ ca |
SA20n1395:744: tadyathā varṣādhāre deve varṣati nāsti vīcirvāntarikā vā vāridhārāṇāṃ prapatantīnāṃ sarvāsu dikṣu evameva sarvāsu dikṣu |
SA20n1395:745: nāstyanto nāsti ca paryanto lokadhātūnāṃ saṃvartamānānāṃ ca vivartamānānāṃ ca |
SA20n1395:747: yatra tathāgatā utpadya buddhakarmāṇi kurvantyaparimāṇeṣu lokadhātuṣu ||
SA20n1395:748: evaṃ ca punarvivṛtte lokasanniveśe pañca gatayaḥ prajñāyante nārakāstiryañcaḥ pratā devā manuṣyāśca |
SA20n1395:754: rdhamāso divaso rātriḥ kṣaṇastatkṣaṇo lavo muhūrtaśca |
SA20n1395:762: yaśo sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ nindā praśaṃsā ca |
SA20n1395:780: bījaphalasaṃgṛhītā nārakāḥ skandhā yacca karma narakavedanīyaṃ |
SA20n1395:788: ye sattvā jarāyupariveṣṭitā jarāyuṃ bhittvā nirgacchanti |
SA20n1395:820: kavaḍaṅkāra āhāraḥ sparśo manaḥsañcetanā vijñānaṃ ca |
SA20n1395:824: ātmā mātāpitarau putradāraṃ dāsīdāsaṃ karmakara pauruṣeyaṃ mitrāmātyajñātisālohitaṃ kṣetravastu gṛhavastu āpaṇavastu puṇyakriyāvastu karmāntaprayogavastūni kośasannidhiśca saptamaṃ vastu ||
SA20n1395:827: bhojanaṃ pānaṃ yānaṃ vastramalaṅkāro hāsyagītanṛtyavāditaṃ gandhamālyavilepanaṃ bhāṇḍopaskara ālokaḥ strīpuruṣaparicaryā ca ||
SA20n1395:831: tadyathā kaupīnapracchādanaṃ kāyaparicaryeryāpathāntarakalpa āhāraḥ svapno maithunaṃ tatpratisaṃyukto vyāyāmastatpratisaṃyuktā ca kathā ||
SA20n1395:845: tadyathā kaṃsakūṭatulākūṭamānakūṭamithyākarmāntaprayogo kalaho bhaṇḍanaṃ vigraho vivāda ākrośanaṃ roṣaṇaṃ paribhāṣaṇaṃ tarjanaṃ tāḍanaṃ vadho bandhanaṃ rodhamaṃ chedanaṃ pravāsanaṃ śāṭhyaṃ vañcanaṃ nikṛtirmṛṣāvādaśca ||
SA20n1395:848: tadyathā nārakāstiryañcaḥ pretā devā manuṣyā kṣatriyā brāhmaṇāḥ vaiśyāḥ śūdrāḥ striyaḥ puruṣāḥ paṇḍakā hīnā madhyāḥ praṇītā gṛhiṇaḥ pravrajitāḥ kaṣṭatapaso'
SA20n1395:849: kaṣṭatapasaḥ sāṃvarikā asāṃvarikā naivasāṃvarikānāsāṃvarikā vītarāgā avītarāgā mithyātvarāśiniyatāḥ samyaktvarāśiniyatā aniyatarāśiniyatā bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇyaḥ śikṣamāṇāḥ śrāmaṇerāḥ śrāmaṇerya upāsakāḥ upāsikā prahāṇikāḥ svādhyāyakārakā vaiyāvṛtyakarāḥ sthavirā madhyā navakā ācāryā upādhyāyāḥ sārdhavihāriṇo'
SA20n1395:850: ntevāsikā āgantukāḥ saṅghavyavahārakā lābhakāmāḥ satkārakāmāḥ saṃlikhitā bahuśrutā jñātamahāpuṇyā dharmānudharmapratipannāḥ sūtradharā vinayadharā mātṛkādharāḥ pṛthagjanāḥ dṛṣṭasatyāḥ śaikṣā aśaikṣāḥ śrāvakāḥ pratyekabuddhā bodhisattvāstathāgatāścakravartinaśca ||
SA20n1395:853: dvidvīpikasya tāmramayaṃ tridvīpikasya rūpyamayaṃ caturdvīpikasya suvarṇamayaṃ ||
SA20n1395:856: tadyathā garbhāvasthā jātāvasthā dahrāvasthā kumārakāvasthā yuvāvasthā madhyāvasthā vṛddhāvasthā jīrṇāvasthā ca |
SA20n1395:859: jīrṇāvasthāyāṃ dahrāvasthāyāṃ ca na parisarpaṇakrīḍanasamartho bhavati |
SA20n1395:881: śvakāyo rathakāyaḥ pattikāyaḥ sannidhibalaṃ mitrabalaṃ ca ||
SA20n1395:891: ārogyamado yauvanamado jīvitamadaḥ kulamado rūpamada aiśvaryamadaḥ śrutamadaśca ||
SA20n1395:893: dṛṣṭo vyavahāraḥ śruto mato vijñāto vyavahāraḥ |
SA20n1395:895: yadanena bahirdhā pratyakṣīkṛtaṃ bhavati cakṣuṣā tadupādāya yatpareṣāṃ vyavaharatyayamucyate dṛṣṭo vyavahāraḥ |
SA20n1395:897: yatparataḥ śrutaṃ bhavati tadupādāya yatpareṣāṃ vyavaharati |
SA20n1395:899: yadanena na dṛṣṭaṃ bhavati na śrutamapi tu svayameva cintitaṃ tulitamupaparīkṣitaṃ tadupādāya yatpareṣāṃ vyavaharati ||
SA20n1395:901: yadanenādhyātmaṃ prativeditaṃ bhavatyadhigataṃ sparśitaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ ca bhavati tadupādāya yatpareṣāṃ vyavaharatyayamucyate vijñāto vyavahāraḥ ||
SA20n1395:913: jātirjarā yāvadicchāvighātaḥ śokaḥ paridevo yauvanamārogyaṃ jīvitaṃ priyasamprayogo'
SA20n1395:921: tadetpañcākāraṃ vastu svabhāvādikaṃ karmaparyavasānaṃ tribhiḥ sthānaiḥ saṃgṛhītaṃ veditavyaṃ |
SA20n1395:930: sarveṣāmādhyātmikabāhyānāṃ bhūtānāmupādāyarūpāṇāṃ cādhyātmaṃ cittasantatau bījāni sanniviṣṭāni |
SA20n1395:931: tatra tāvadupādāyarūpabījamupādāya rūpaṃ janayati yāvadbhūtabījena bhūtānyajanitāni bhavanti |
SA20n1395:932: bhūteṣu punarjāteṣu tadupādāyarūpaṃ svabījādevotpadyamānaṃ tadupādāya jātamityucyate tajjātipūrvaṅgamatvāt |
SA20n1395:942: āhāramāgagya svapnaṃ vā brahmacaryavāsaṃ vā samādhiṃ vā tadāśritaṃ bhūyobhāvavṛddhivaipulyatāṃ gacchati |
SA20n1395:944: idaṃ copādāyarūpe mahābhūtānāṃ pañcākāraṃ kāritraṃ veditavyaṃ ||
SA20n1395:961: tadyathā bhūtaparamāṇo rūpaśabdagandharasa spraṣṭavyānāmanindriya indriyavarjyānāṃ sendriye sendriyāṇāmekadeśāvinirbhāgaḥ |
SA20n1395:965: tasya punaḥ kṛtsnasya rūpasamudāyasya vividhadravyaśilāniṣpiṣṭāpsamāyuktavanmiśrībhāvā vinirbhāgo draṣṭavyo no tu tilamudgamāṣakulattharāśivat |
SA20n1395:966: sarvaṃ copādāyarūpaṃ mahābhūtadeśāśritameva na mahābhūtadeśamatiricya vartate ||
SA20n1395:970: ata eva ca mahābhūtānāṃ mahābhūtamiti saṃjñā |
SA20n1395:973: tadyathā pṛthivyāpastejo vāto rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyāni cakṣurādīni ca rūpāṇi pañcendriyāṇi sthāpayitvā manogocarameva rūpaṃ |
SA20n1395:979: dhātusaṃgraheṇa punaryaḥ samudāyo yāvaddhātukaḥ sa tāvadbhirdravyaiḥ saṃgṛhīto vaktavyaḥ ||
SA20n1395:980: avinirbhāgasaṃgrahaḥ punaryāvanto dharmā lakṣaṇato yasmin samudāya upalabhyante tāvadbhirdravyaistasya samudāyasya saṃgraho veditavya ādhyātmike vā bāhye vā samudāye |
SA20n1395:983: tadyathā pāṣāṇa muktāvaidūryaśaṅkhapravāḍādiṣu utsasarastaḍāganadīprasravaṇādiṣu arciḥpradīpolkādiṣu pūrvadakṣiṇapaścimottaravāyumaṇḍalasarajaskārajaskavāyvādiṣu ca |
SA20n1395:988: tapteṣu teṣveva vṛkṣādiṣu samīriteṣu vā punaḥ |
SA20n1395:992: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā yadadhyātmaṃ pratyātmaṃ keśādayaḥ purīṣaparyavasānāḥ ayamādhyātmikaḥ pṛthavīdhātuḥ |
SA20n1395:994: yenāyaṃ kalpa ātapyate santapyate yasya cotsadatvājjvarita iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati sa tejodhātuḥ |
SA20n1395:1010: citta sanniviṣṭasya ca rūpasamudāyabījasya sāmarthyādubhayamapratyayasānnidhye kadācidaṇukasya samudāyasyānantaraṃ mahataḥ samudāyasya prādurbhāvo bhavati |
SA20n1395:1029: tatra sarvasmin rūpasamudāye sarveṣāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ dhāturvidyate sarvakālaṃ |
SA20n1395:1031: tathā pāṣāṇa...agnirjāyate tathā loha rūpyasuvarṇādīnāṃ pragāḍhāgnisamprataptānāṃ dravatotpadyate |
SA20n1395:1032: tathā candrakāntādapāmevamṛddhimataścittādhimokṣavaśācca pṛthivyādīnāṃ suvarṇādīnāṃ ca prādurbhāvo bhavati ||
SA20n1395:1034: tribhiḥ srotobhiḥ pravṛttirbhavatyaupacayikena naiṣyandikena vipākajena ca |
SA20n1395:1035: tatraupacayikaṃ dvividhaṃ deśavyāptaupacayikaṃ lakṣaṇa puṣṭaupacayikaṃ ca |
SA20n1395:1038: vipākajaṃ dvividhaṃ vipākatvena ca jātaṃ vipākajaṃ |
SA20n1395:1043: tatra cittacaitasakalāpe citaṃ copalabhyate caitasāśca tripañcāśadupalabhyante |
SA20n1395:1045: eṣāṃ caitasānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kati sarvatra citta utpadyante sarvabhūmike sarvadā sarve ca |
SA20n1395:1048: kati sarvatrotpadyante sarvabhūmike na ca sarvadā na sarve |
SA20n1395:1051: api tu sarvabhūmike na sarvadā na sarve ||
SA20n1395:1054: kati kliṣṭa eva na sarvatra na sarvabhūmike na sarvadā na sarve |
SA20n1395:1056: kati sarvatra no tu sarvebhūmike na sarvadā na sarve |
SA20n1395:1066: adhiṣṭhānato vā svabhāvato vā deśato vā kālato vā vyaktāvyaktato vā sakalavastvekadeśato vā |
SA20n1395:1069: avacchādanīyenāvaraṇena antardhāpanīyena abhibhavanīyena saṃmohanīyena ca dvābhyāṃ viprakarṣābhyāṃ deśaviprakarṣato'
SA20n1395:1081: yatra viṣaya audārikataro vā manāpataro vā pratyupasthito bhavati tatrābhogo bahutara utpadyate ||
SA20n1395:1083: yatsaṃstutataraṃ bhavati paricitataraṃ tatrābhogo bahutara utpadyate |
SA20n1395:1084: anyathā tvekasminnālambana ekaprakārasyaiva manaskārasya nityakālamutpattiḥ syāt |
SA20n1395:1085: na cāsti pañcānāṃ vijñānakāyānāṃ saha dvayoḥ kṣaṇayorutpattiḥ nāpyanyonyasamanantaramanyonyotpattiḥ |
SA20n1395:1088: tataḥ śrotra vijñānaṃ vānyatamānyatamadvā pañcānāṃ vijñānakāyānāṃ |
SA20n1395:1091: tābhyāṃ ca niścitaparyeṣakābhyāṃ manovijñānābhyāṃ sa viṣayo vikalpyate ||
SA20n1395:1092: tatra dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ kliṣṭasya vā kuśalasya vā dharmasyotpattirbhavati |
SA20n1395:1103: ekena padasanniśrayeṇaikasmin vastuni yāvatā kālena vijñaptirupadyate tāvadekacittaṃ |
SA20n1395:1110: pañcānāṃ vijñānakāyānāṃ samanantarotpannaṃ manaḥparyeṣakaṃ niścitaṃ vā vartamānaviṣayameva vaktavyaṃ |
SA20n1395:1115: tatraiva śubhāśubhobhayaviparītalakṣaṇaṃ yat tat sparśena pratipadyate |
SA20n1395:1118: tatraiva samyaṅmithyobhaya viparītapratipattilakṣaṇaṃ yat taccetanayā pratipadyate |
SA20n1395:1119: tasmādete manaskārādayaścetanāparyavasānāścaitasāḥ sarvatra sarvabhūmike sarvadā sarve cotpadyante ||
SA20n1395:1131: yadīpsite vastuni tatra tatra tadanugā kartukāmatā ||
SA20n1395:1137: yatparīkṣye vastuni tatra tatra tadanugamupanidhyānasaṃniśritaṃ cittaikāgryaṃ ||
SA20n1395:1139: yatparīkṣya eva vastuni tatra tatra tadanugo dharmāṇā pravicayo yogavihitato vāyogavihitato vā naiva yogavihitato nāyogavihitataḥ ||
SA20n1395:1165: kathaṃ jātyā jarāyāḥ sthiteranityatāyāśca vyavasthānaṃ bhavati |
SA20n1395:1166: sarvatra vijñānasantāne sarvo bījasantānaḥ sahacaro vyavasthāpyate sati pratyaye |
SA20n1395:1167: pratyayavaśāttatprathamataḥ santatyānutpannapūrvo yo dharma utpadyate sā jātiḥ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇamityucyate ||
SA20n1395:1174: tānyetāni tasyaiva dharmasyāvasthābhedena catvāri lakṣaṇāni bhavanti ||
SA20n1395:1179: samanantarapratyayo yasya vijñānasyānantaraṃ yeṣāṃ vijñānānāmutpattiniyamaḥ sa teṣāṃ samanantarapratyayaḥ |
SA20n1395:1191: yaduktaṃ ye hetavo ye pratyayā vijñānasyotpādāyeti |
SA20n1395:1199: caturvidhaṃ puṇyabhāgīyaṃ mokṣabhāgīyaṃ nirvedhabhāgīya manāsravaṃ ca |
SA20n1395:1200: pañcavidhaṃ dānamayaṃ śīlamayaṃ bhāvanāmayamiṣṭaphalaṃ visaṃyogaphalaṃ ca |
SA20n1395:1201: ṣaḍvidhaṃ kuśalaṃ rūpaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskāro vijñānaṃ pratisaṃkhyānirodhaśca |
SA20n1395:1203: aṣṭavidhamabhivādanavandanapratyusthānāñjalikarmasaṃgṛhītaṃ subhāṣite sādhukāradānabhūtavarṇāharaṇasaṃgṛhītaṃ glānopasthānasaṃgṛhītaṃ gurūṇāṃ gauraveṇopasthānasaṃgṛhītamanumodanāsaṃgṛhītaṃ parasamādāpanā saṃgṛhītaṃ pariṇāmanāsaṃgṛhītamapramāṇabhāvanāsaṃgṛhītaṃ |
SA20n1395:1205: daśavidhamaupadhikaṃ niraupadhikaṃ śrutamayaṃ cintāmayaṃ saṃvarasaṃgṛhītaṃ naivasaṃvaranāsaṃvarasaṃgṛhītaṃ maulasāmantakasaṃgṛhītaṃ śrāvakayānasaṃgṛhītaṃ pratyekabuddhayānasaṃgṛhītaṃ mahāyānasaṃgṛhītaṃ |
SA20n1395:1209: punardaśavidhamaṣṭāsu puṇyopapattiṣu cakravartirāja saṃvartanīyamāniñjyopagaṃ ca kuśalamityevaṃbhāgīyaḥ kuśalaprabhedaḥ ||
SA20n1395:1215: yatkiñcicchilpaṃ ratikrīḍārthaṃ karoti na jīvikārthaṃ na karmasaṃjñayā na pratisaṃkhyāya tacchailpasthitikaṃ kliṣṭaṃ avyākṛtamanyat |
SA20n1395:1223: svasantānapatitaṃ parasantānapatitamabhirūpaṃ virūpaṃ samalaṃ nirmalaṃ ca |
SA20n1395:1226: navavidhaṃ pratilabdhamapratilabdhaṃ pratilabdhapūrvamapratilabdhapūrvaṃ pratilabdhavihīnaṃ prahātavyamaprahātavyaṃ prahīṇamaprahīṇaṃ |
SA20n1395:1228: ekādaśavidhamatītamanāgataṃ pratyutpannamādhyātmikaṃ bāhyamaudārikaṃ sūkṣmaṃ hīnaṃ praṇītaṃ dūre'ntike ||
SA20n1395:1253: aṣṭavidhamadhivacanasaṃsparśasamprayuktaṃ pratighasaṃsparśasamprayuktaṃ gardhāśritaṃ naiṣkramyāśritaṃ sāmiṣaṃ nirāmiṣaṃ laukikaṃ lokottaraṃ ca |
SA20n1395:1267: ṣaḍvidhaṃ pratiṣṭhāsaṃgṛhītaṃ nilayasaṃgṛhītaṃ viṣayasaṃgṛhītaṃ sattvasaṃkhyātamasattvasaṃkhyātaṃ sanirśanasapratidhaṃ ca |
SA20n1395:1269: aṣṭavidhamaṣṭasu lokacitreṣu tāni punarbhūmibhāgacitraṃ parvatacitramārāmavanasarastaḍāgādicitraṃ gṛhavimānacitraṃ karmasthānacitramālekhyacitraṃ kuṭṭimakarmacitraṃ pariṣkāracitraṃ ca |
SA20n1395:1270: navavidhamatītamanāgataṃ pratyutpannamaudarikaṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā yadvā dūre yadvāntike |
SA20n1395:1283: saptavidhaḥ strīśabdaḥ puruṣaśabdo mṛdumadhyādhimātro mṛtavihaṅgādiśabdo vātavanaspatiśabdaśca |
SA20n1395:1290: śrute mate vijñāte vijñātavāditā avijñāte cāvijñātavāditāryo vyavahāraḥ |
SA20n1395:1294: sa punarnṛtyasahagato gītasahagato vāditrasahagataḥ strīsahagataḥ puruṣasahagataśca |
SA20n1395:1301: pañcavidho mūlagandhaḥ sāragandhaḥ patragandhaḥ puṣpagandhaḥ phalagandhaśca |
SA20n1395:1310: daśavidhaḥ strīgandhaḥ puruṣagandha uccāragandhaḥ prasrāvagandhaḥ kheṭagandhaḥ śiṅghāṇagandho vasālasikāpūyaśoṇitagandho māṃsagandhaḥ saṅkaragandhaḥ kledakardamagandhaśca ||
SA20n1395:1322: daśavidhaḥ khādyaraso bhojanarasaḥ svādyarasaḥ peyarasaścūṣyaraso viśeṣaṇīyastarpaṇīyaḥ śamanīyaḥ śodhanīyo niṣevaṇīyaścauṣadharasaḥ ||
SA20n1395:1333: khakkhaṭo drava uṣṇa ullaṅghanapatanasaṃsparśaḥ parāmarśasaṃsparśaḥ kāyavikārasaṃsparśaśca |
SA20n1395:1335: aṣṭavidhaḥ pāṇisaṃsparśo loṣṭasaṃsparśo daṇḍasaṃsparśaḥ śastrasaṃsparśaḥ śītasaṃsparśa uṣṇasaṃsparśo jighatsāsaṃsparśaḥ pipāsāsaṃsparśaḥ |
SA20n1395:1338: laṅkārasaṃsparśo mañcapīṭhasaṃsparśaḥ kūrcabimbopadhānasaṃsparśaḥ strīsaṃsparśaḥ puruṣasaṃsparśastayoḥ paricaryāparibhogasaṃsparśaśca ||
SA20n1395:1343: saṃvarāsaṃvarasaṃgṛhītaṃ rūpaṃ samādhigocarañca rūpaṃ prāptirasaṃjñāsamāpattirnirodhasamāpattirāsaṃjñikaṃ jīvitendriyaṃ nikāyasabhāgaḥ pṛthigjanatvaṃ jātirjarā sthitiranityatā nāmakāyāḥ padakāyā vyañjanakāyāḥ pravṛttiḥ pratiniyamo yogo javo'
SA20n1395:1344: nukramaḥ kālo deśaḥ saṃkhyā sāmagryasāmagrī ca |
SA20n1395:1345: aṣṭāvasaṃskṛtavastūni ākāśamapratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tathatāniñjyaṃ saṃjñāvedayitanirodhaśca |
SA20n1395:1346: tānyetānyaṣṭau samānāni ṣaḍ bhavanti ṣaṭ samānānyaṣṭau bhavanti ||
SA20n1395:1352: caturvidho rūpī prajñaptidharmasaṃgṛhītaḥ arūpī caitasadharmasaṃgṛhītaḥ arūpī viprayuktaprajñaptisaṃgṛhītaḥ arūpyasaṃskṛtaprajñaptidharmasaṃgṛhītaśca ||
SA20n1395:1354: ṣaḍvidhaḥ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ samprayuktaviprayuktā rūpamasaṃskṛtaṃ ca |
SA20n1395:1361: daśavidho daśavidhārthena anubandhotpādārthena ālambanānubhavanārthena ālambananimittagrahaṇārthena ālambanābhisaṃskārārthena teṣāmeva dharmāṇāmavasthābhedārthena anityavisaṃyogārthena nityavisaṃyogārthena nityāvipītārthena sukhaduḥkhavisaṃyogārthena no tu vedayitavisaṃyogārthena vedayitavisaṃyogārthena ca |
SA20n1395:1363: tatra caratyākṣayādrūpāṇāṃ darśanāya caratyākṣayādrūpāṇāṃ darśanāyeti cakṣuḥ |
SA20n1395:1370: atra ca lokasya saṃjñā sattvo naro jīvo janturmanujo mānava iti mana iti ||
SA20n1395:1371: tatra tatra deśe nirūpyate rohati ceti tasmādrūpamiti vadanneva śarati vadanneva śarati tasmācchabdaḥ |
SA20n1395:1376: dhārayati kevalaṃ manoviṣayatvaṃ dhārayati kevalaṃ manoviṣayatvamiti dharmaḥ ||
SA20n1395:1377: tatraibhiḥ pañcabhirdharmaiḥ ṣaḍvijñānakāyikaiḥ svabhāvenāśrayeṇālambanena sahāyena karmaṇā ca skandhakauśalyamapi saṃgṛhītaṃ veditavyaṃ |
SA20n1395:1381: sattvavastu upabhogavastu utpattivastu sthitivastu saṃkleśavyavadānavastu vaicitryavastu daiśikavastu deśyavastu pariṣadvastu ca ||
